pokemon.name: Bulbusaur
pokemon.description: There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this Pokémon is born. The seed slowly grows larger.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.description: Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.

pokemon.name: Ivysaur
pokemon.description: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.description: Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.

pokemon.name: Venusaur
pokemon.description: Its plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.description: Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.

pokemon.name: Charmander
pokemon.description: It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: Powers up Fire-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.

pokemon.name: Charmeleon
pokemon.description: It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: Powers up Fire-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.

pokemon.name: Charizard
pokemon.description: It spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. It may cause forest fires by blowing flames.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: Powers up Fire-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.

pokemon.name: Squirtle
pokemon.description: When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.description: Powers up Water-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.

pokemon.name: Wartortle
pokemon.description: It is recognized as a symbol of longevity. If its shell has algae on it, that Wartortle is very old.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.description: Powers up Water-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.

pokemon.name: Blastoise
pokemon.description: It crushes its foe under its heavy body to cause fainting. In a pinch, it will withdraw inside its shell.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.description: Powers up Water-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.

pokemon.name: Caterpie
pokemon.description: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antenna on its head to drive away enemies.

abilities.name: Shield Dust
abilities.description: Protective dust shields the Pokémon from the additional effects of moves.

pokemon.name: Metapod
pokemon.description: It is waiting for the moment to evolve. At this stage, it can only harden, so it remains motionless to avoid attack.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.description: The Pokémon may cure its own status conditions by shedding its skin.

pokemon.name: Butterfree
pokemon.description: In battle, it flaps its wings at great speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

abilities.name: Compound Eyes
abilities.description: The Pokémon's compound eyes boost its accuracy.

pokemon.name: Weedle
pokemon.description: Beware of the sharp stinger on its head. It hides in grass and bushes where it eats leaves.

abilities.name: Shield Dust
abilities.description: Protective dust shields the Pokémon from the additional effects of moves.

pokemon.name: Kakuna
pokemon.description: Able to move only slightly. When endangered, it may stick out its stinger and poison its enemy.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.description: The Pokémon may cure its own status conditions by shedding its skin.

pokemon.name: Beedrill
pokemon.description: It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.description: Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.

pokemon.name: Pidgey
pokemon.description: Very docile. If attacked, it will often kick up sand to protect itself rather than fight back.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: The Pokémon's keen eyes prevent its accuracy from being lowered.

abilities.name: Tangled Feet
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's evasiveness if it is confused.

pokemon.name: Pidgeotto
pokemon.description: This Pokémon is full of vitality. It constantly flies around its large territory in search of prey.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: The Pokémon's keen eyes prevent its accuracy from being lowered.

abilities.name: Tangled Feet
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's evasiveness if it is confused.

pokemon.name: Pidgeot
pokemon.description: This Pokémon flies at Mach 2 speed, seeking prey. Its large talons are feared as wicked weapons.

abilities.name: Keen Eye

abilities.name: Tangled Feet
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's evasiveness if it is confused.

pokemon.name: Rattata
pokemon.description: Will chew on anything with its fangs. If you see one, you can be certain that 40 more live in the area.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.description: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

abilities.name: Guts
abilities.description: It's so gutsy that having a status condition boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat.

pokemon.name: Raticate
pokemon.description: Its hind feet are webbed. They act as flippers, so it can swim in rivers and hunt for prey.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.description: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

abilities.name: Guts
abilities.description: It's so gutsy that having a status condition boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat.

pokemon.name: Spearow
pokemon.description: Inept at flying high. However, it can fly around very fast to protect its territory.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: The Pokémon's keen eyes prevent its accuracy from being lowered.

pokemon.name: Fearow
pokemon.description: A Pokémon that dates back many years. If it senses danger, it flies high and away, instantly.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: The Pokémon's keen eyes prevent its accuracy from being lowered.

pokemon.name: Ekans
pokemon.description: The older it gets, the longer it grows. At night, it wraps its long body around tree branches to rest.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.description: The Pokémon may cure its own status conditions by shedding its skin.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.description: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it intimidates opposing Pokémon and makes them cower, lowering their Attack stats.

pokemon.name: Arbok
pokemon.description: The frightening patterns on its belly have been studied. Six variations have been confirmed.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.description: The Pokémon may cure its own status conditions by shedding its skin.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.description: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it intimidates opposing Pokémon and makes them cower, lowering their Attack stats.

pokemon.name: Pikachu
pokemon.description: When it is angered, it immediately discharges the energy stored in the pouches in its cheeks.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.description: The Pokémon is charged with static electricity and may paralyze attackers that make direct contact with it.

pokemon.name: Raichu
pokemon.description: Its tail discharges electricity into the ground, protecting it from getting shocked.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.description: The Pokémon is charged with static electricity and may paralyze attackers that make direct contact with it.

pokemon.name: Sandshrew
pokemon.description: It loves to bathe in the grit of dry, sandy areas. By sand bathing, the Pokémon rids itself of dirt and moisture clinging to its body.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's evasiveness in a sandstorm.

pokemon.name: Sandslash
pokemon.description: The drier the area Sandslash lives in, the harder and smoother the Pokémon’s spikes will feel when touched.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's evasiveness in a sandstorm.

pokemon.name: Nidoran ♀
pokemon.description: Females are more sensitive to smells than males. While foraging, they'll use their whiskers to check wind direction and stay downwind of predators.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

abilities.name: Rivalry
abilities.description: The Pokémon's competitive spirit makes it deal more damage to Pokémon of the same gender, but less damage to Pokémon of the opposite gender.

pokemon.name: Nidorina
pokemon.description: The horn on its head has atrophied. It's thought that this happens so Nidorina's children won't get poked while their mother is feeding them.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

abilities.name: Rivalry
abilities.description: The Pokémon's competitive spirit makes it deal more damage to Pokémon of the same gender, but less damage to Pokémon of the opposite gender.

pokemon.name: Nidoqueen
pokemon.description: Nidoqueen is better at defense than offense. With scales like armor, this Pokémon will shield its children from any kind of attack.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

abilities.name: Rivalry
abilities.description: The Pokémon's competitive spirit makes it deal more damage to Pokémon of the same gender, but less damage to Pokémon of the opposite gender.

pokemon.name: Nidoran ♂
pokemon.description: The horn on a male Nidoran's forehead contains a powerful poison. This is a very cautious Pokémon, always straining its large ears.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

abilities.name: Rivalry
abilities.description: The Pokémon's competitive spirit makes it deal more damage to Pokémon of the same gender, but less damage to Pokémon of the opposite gender.

pokemon.name: Nidorino
pokemon.description: With a horn that's harder than diamond, this Pokémon goes around shattering boulders as it searches for a moon stone

abilities.name: Poison Point

abilities.name: Rivalry
abilities.description: The Pokémon's competitive spirit makes it deal more damage to Pokémon of the same gender, but less damage to Pokémon of the opposite gender.

pokemon.name: Nidoking
pokemon.description: When it goes on a rampage, it's impossible to control. But in the presence of a Nidoqueen it's lived with for a long time, Nidoking calms down.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

abilities.name: Rivalry
abilities.description: The Pokémon's competitive spirit makes it deal more damage to Pokémon of the same gender, but less damage to Pokémon of the opposite gender.

pokemon.name: Clefairy
pokemon.description: It is said that happiness will come to those who see a gathering of Clefairy dancing under a full moon.

abilities.name: Magic Guard
abilities.description: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.

pokemon.name: Clefable

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.description: The Pokémon may infatuate attackers that make direct contact with it.

abilities.name: Magic Guard
abilities.description: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.

pokemon.name: Vulpix
pokemon.description: While young, it has six gorgeous tails. When it grows, several new tails are sprouted.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.description: If hit by a Fire-type move, the Pokémon absorbs the flames and uses them to power up its own Fire-type moves.

pokemon.name: Jigglypuff
pokemon.description: When its huge eyes waver, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.description: The Pokémon may infatuate attackers that make direct contact with it.

abilities.name: Competitive
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Sp. Atk stat sharply when its stats are lowered by an opposing Pokémon.

pokemon.name: Wigglytuff
pokemon.description: It has a very fine fur. Take care not to make it angry, or it may inflate steadily and hit with a body slam.

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.description: The Pokémon may infatuate attackers that make direct contact with it.

abilities.name: Competitive
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Sp. Atk stat sharply when its stats are lowered by an opposing Pokémon.

pokemon.name: Zubat
pokemon.description: It emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth to check its surroundings. Even in tight caves, Zubat flies around with skill.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: The Pokémon's intense focus prevents it from flinching or being affected by Intimidate.

pokemon.name: Golbat
pokemon.description: It loves to drink other creatures' blood. It's said that if it finds others of its kind going hungry, it sometimes shares the blood it's gathered.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: The Pokémon's intense focus prevents it from flinching or being affected by Intimidate.

pokemon.name: Oddish
pokemon.description: If exposed to moonlight, it starts to move. It roams far and wide at night to scatter its seeds.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in harsh sunlight.

pokemon.name: Gloom
pokemon.description: Its pistils exude an incredibly foul odor. The horrid stench can cause fainting at a distance of 1.25 miles.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in harsh sunlight.

pokemon.name: Vileplume
pokemon.description: It has the world’s largest petals. With every step, the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in harsh sunlight.

pokemon.name: Paras
pokemon.description: Burrows under the ground to gnaw on tree roots. The mushrooms on its back absorb most of the nutrition.

abilities.name: Effect Spore
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may inflict poison, sleep, or paralysis on the attacker.

abilities.name: Dry Skin
abilities.description: Restores the Pokémon's HP in rain or when it is hit by Water-type moves. Reduces HP in harsh sunlight, and increases the damage received from Fire-type moves.

pokemon.name: Parasect
pokemon.description: The bug host is drained of energy by the mushroom on its back. The mushroom appears to do all the thinking.

abilities.name: Effect Spore
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may inflict poison, sleep, or paralysis on the attacker.

abilities.name: Dry Skin
abilities.description: Restores the Pokémon's HP in rain or when it is hit by Water-type moves. Reduces HP in harsh sunlight, and increases the damage received from Fire-type moves.

pokemon.name: Venonat
pokemon.description: Poison oozes from all over its body. It catches small bug Pokémon at night that are attracted by light.

abilities.name: Tinted Lens
abilities.description: The Pokémon can use “not very effective” moves to deal regular damage.

pokemon.description: The wings are covered with dustlike scales. Every time it flaps its wings, it looses highly toxic dust.

abilities.name: Tinted Lens

pokemon.description: Its three heads bob separately up and down to loosen the soil nearby, making it easier for it to burrow.

abilities.name: Arena Trap
abilities.description: Prevents opposing Pokémon from fleeing from battle.

pokemon.name: Meowth
pokemon.description: All it does is sleep during the daytime. At night, it patrols its territory with its eyes aglow.

abilities.name: Pickup
abilities.description: The Pokémon may pick up an item another Pokémon used during a battle. It may pick up items outside of battle, too.

abilities.name: Technician
abilities.description: Powers up weak moves so the Pokémon can deal more damage with them.

pokemon.name: Persian
pokemon.description: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.

abilities.name: Technician
abilities.description: Powers up weak moves so the Pokémon can deal more damage with them.

pokemon.name: Psyduck
pokemon.description: It is constantly wracked by a headache. When the headache turns intense, it begins using mysterious powers.

abilities.name: Damp

abilities.name: Cloud Nine
abilities.description: Eliminates the effects of weather.

pokemon.name: Golduck
pokemon.description: When it swims at full speed using its long, webbed limbs, its forehead somehow begins to glow.

abilities.name: Cloud Nine
abilities.description: Eliminates the effects of weather.

pokemon.name: Mankey
pokemon.description: It lives in groups in the treetops. If it loses sight of its group, it becomes infuriated by its loneliness.

abilities.name: Vital Spirit
abilities.description: The Pokémon is full of vitality, and that prevents it from falling asleep.

abilities.name: Anger Point
abilities.description: The Pokémon is angered when it takes a critical hit, and that maxes its Attack stat.

pokemon.name: Primeape
pokemon.description: It becomes wildly furious if it even senses someone looking at it. It chases anyone that meets its glare.

abilities.description: The Pokémon is angered when it takes a critical hit, and that maxes its Attack stat.

pokemon.name: Growlithe
pokemon.description: It has a brave and trustworthy nature. It fearlessly stands up to bigger and stronger foes.

abilities.name: Intimidate

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.description: If hit by a Fire-type move, the Pokémon absorbs the flames and uses them to power up its own Fire-type moves.

pokemon.name: Arcanine
pokemon.description: An ancient picture scroll shows that people were captivated by its movement as it ran through prairies.

abilities.name: Intimidate

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.description: If hit by a Fire-type move, the Pokémon absorbs the flames and uses them to power up its own Fire-type moves.

pokemon.name: Poliwag
pokemon.description: For Poliwag, swimming is easier than walking. The swirl pattern on its belly is actually part of the Pokémon’s innards showing through the skin.

abilities.name: Damp
abilities.description: The Pokémon dampens its surroundings, preventing all Pokémon from using explosive moves such as Self-Destruct.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.description: If hit by a Water-type move, the Pokémon has its HP restored instead of taking damage.

pokemon.name: Poliwhirl
pokemon.description: Staring at the swirl on its belly causes drowsiness. This trait of Poliwhirl's has been used in place of lullabies to get children to go to sleep.

abilities.name: Damp
abilities.description: The Pokémon dampens its surroundings, preventing all Pokémon from using explosive moves such as Self-Destruct.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.description: If hit by a Water-type move, the Pokémon has its HP restored instead of taking damage.

pokemon.name: Poliwrath
pokemon.description: Its body is solid muscle. When swimming through cold seas, Poliwrath uses its impressive arms to smash through drift ice and plow forward.

abilities.name: Water Absorb

pokemon.name: Abra
pokemon.description: This Pokémon uses its psychic powers while it sleeps. The contents of Abra’s dreams affect the powers that the Pokémon wields.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: The Pokémon's intense focus prevents it from flinching or being affected by Intimidate.

abilities.name: Synchronize
abilities.description: If the Pokémon is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned by another Pokémon, that Pokémon will be inflicted with the same status condition.

pokemon.name: Kadabra
pokemon.description: Using its psychic power, Kadabra levitates as it sleeps. It uses its springy tail as a pillow.

abilities.name: Inner Focus

abilities.name: Synchronize
abilities.description: If the Pokémon is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned by another Pokémon, that Pokémon will be inflicted with the same status condition.

pokemon.name: Alakazam
pokemon.description: It has an incredibly high level of intelligence. Some say that Alakazam remembers everything that ever happens to it, from birth till death.

abilities.name: Synchronize
abilities.description: If the Pokémon is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned by another Pokémon, that Pokémon will be inflicted with the same status condition.

pokemon.name: Machop
pokemon.description: Its whole body is composed of muscles. Even though it's the size of a human child, it can hurl 100 grown-ups.

abilities.name: Guts
abilities.description: It's so gutsy that having a status condition boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat.

abilities.name: No Guard
abilities.description: The Pokémon employs no-guard tactics to ensure incoming and outgoing attacks always land.

pokemon.name: Machoke
pokemon.description: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power-save belt to be able to regulate its motions.

abilities.name: Guts

abilities.name: No Guard
abilities.description: The Pokémon employs no-guard tactics to ensure incoming and outgoing attacks always land.

pokemon.name: Machamp
pokemon.description: It quickly swings its four arms to rock its opponents with ceaseless punches and chops from all angles.

abilities.name: Guts
abilities.description: It's so gutsy that having a status condition boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat.

abilities.name: No Guard
abilities.description: The Pokémon employs no-guard tactics to ensure incoming and outgoing attacks always land.

pokemon.name: Bellsprout
pokemon.description: Prefers hot and humid places. It ensnares tiny bugs with its vines and devours them.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in harsh sunlight.

pokemon.name: Weepinbell
pokemon.description: When hungry, it swallows anything that moves. Its hapless prey is dissolved by strong acids.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in harsh sunlight.

pokemon.name: Victreebel
pokemon.description: Lures prey with the sweet aroma of honey. Swallowed whole, the prey is dissolved in a day, bones and all.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in harsh sunlight.

pokemon.name: Tentacool
pokemon.description: Tentacool is not a particularly strong swimmer. It drifts across the surface of shallow seas as it searches for prey.

abilities.name: Clear Body
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon's moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon's stats.

abilities.name: Liquid Ooze
abilities.description: The strong stench of the Pokémon's oozed liquid damages attackers that use HP-draining moves.

pokemon.name: Tentacruel
pokemon.description: When the red orbs on Tentacruel's head glow brightly, watch out. The Pokémon is about to fire off a burst of ultrasonic waves.

abilities.name: Clear Body
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon's moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon's stats.

abilities.name: Liquid Ooze
abilities.description: The strong stench of the Pokémon's oozed liquid damages attackers that use HP-draining moves.

pokemon.name: Geodude
pokemon.description: Commonly found near mountain trails and the like. If you step on one by accident, it gets angry.

abilities.name: Rock Head
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.description: The Pokémon cannot be knocked out by a single hit as long as its HP is full. One-hit KO moves will also fail to knock it out.

pokemon.name: Graveler
pokemon.description: Often seen rolling down mountain trails. Obstacles are just things to roll straight over, not avoid.

abilities.name: Rock Head
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.description: The Pokémon cannot be knocked out by a single hit as long as its HP is full. One-hit KO moves will also fail to knock it out.

pokemon.name: Golem
pokemon.description: Once it sheds its skin, its body turns tender and whitish. Its hide hardens when it's exposed to air.

abilities.name: Rock Head
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.description: The Pokémon cannot be knocked out by a single hit as long as its HP is full. One-hit KO moves will also fail to knock it out.

pokemon.name: Ponyta
pokemon.description: It can't run properly when it's newly born. As it races around with others of its kind, its legs grow stronger.

pokemon.name: Rapidash
pokemon.description: This Pokémon can be seen galloping through fields at speeds of up to 150 mph, its fiery mane fluttering in the wind.

pokemon.name: Slowpoke
pokemon.description: It is incredibly slow and dopey. It takes five seconds for it to feel pain when under attack.

pokemon.name: Slowbro
pokemon.description: When a Slowpoke went hunting in the sea, its tail was bitten by a Shellder. That made it evolve into Slowbro.

pokemon.name: Magnemite
pokemon.description: The electromagnetic waves emitted by the units at the sides of its head expel antigravity, which allows it to float.

pokemon.name: Magneton
pokemon.description: Three Magnemite are linked by a strong magnetic force. Earaches will occur if you get too close.

pokemon.name: Farfetch'd
pokemon.description: The stalk this Pokémon carries in its wings serves as a sword to cut down opponents. In a dire situation, the stalk can also serve as food.

pokemon.name: Doduo
pokemon.description: Its short wings make flying difficult. Instead, this Pokémon runs at high speed on developed legs.

pokemon.name: Dodrio
pokemon.description: One of Doduo’s two heads splits to form a unique species. It runs close to 40 mph in prairies.

pokemon.name: Seel
pokemon.description: Loves freezing-cold conditions. Relishes swimming in a frigid climate of around 14 degrees Fahrenheit.

pokemon.name: Dewgong
pokemon.description: Its entire body is a snowy white. Unharmed by even intense cold, it swims powerfully in icy waters.

pokemon.name: Grimer
pokemon.description: Born from sludge, these Pokémon now gather in polluted places and increase the bacteria in their bodies.

pokemon.name: Muk
pokemon.description: It’s thickly covered with a filthy, vile sludge. It is so toxic, even its footprints contain poison.

pokemon.name: Shellder
pokemon.description: It is encased in a shell that is harder than diamond. Inside, however, it is surprisingly tender.

pokemon.name: Cloyster
pokemon.description: Cloyster that live in seas with harsh tidal currents grow large, sharp spikes on their shells.

pokemon.name: Gastly
pokemon.description: It wraps its opponent in its gas-like body, slowly weakening its prey by poisoning it through the skin.

pokemon.name: Haunter
pokemon.description: It likes to lurk in the dark and tap shoulders with a gaseous hand. Its touch causes endless shuddering.

pokemon.name: Gengar
pokemon.description: To steal the life of its target, it slips into the prey’s shadow and silently waits for an opportunity.

pokemon.name: Onix
pokemon.description: As it digs through the ground, it absorbs many hard objects. This is what makes its body so solid.

pokemon.name: Drowzee
pokemon.description: It remembers every dream it eats. It rarely eats the dreams of adults because children's are much tastier.

pokemon.name: Hynpo
pokemon.description: When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use a mix of psi moves, such as Hypnosis and Confusion.

pokemon.name: Krabby
pokemon.description: It can be found near the sea. The large pincers grow back if they are torn out of their sockets.

pokemon.name: Kingler
pokemon.description: Its large and hard pincer has 10,000-horsepower strength. However, being so big, it is unwieldy to move.

pokemon.name: Voltorb
pokemon.description: It rolls to move. If the ground is uneven, a sudden jolt from hitting a bump can cause it to explode.

pokemon.name: Electrode
pokemon.description: The more energy it charges up, the faster it gets. But this also makes it more likely to explode.

pokemon.name: Exeggcute
pokemon.description: Though it may look like it’s just a bunch of eggs, it’s a proper Pokémon. Exeggcute communicates with others of its kind via telepathy, apparently.

pokemon.name: Exeggutor
pokemon.description: Each of Exeggutor’s three heads is thinking different thoughts. The three don’t seem to be very interested in one another.

pokemon.name: Cubone
pokemon.description: When the memory of its departed mother brings it to tears, its cries echo mournfully within the skull it wears on its head.

pokemon.name: Marowak
pokemon.description: This Pokémon overcame its sorrow to evolve a sturdy new body. Marowak faces its opponents bravely, using a bone as a weapon.

pokemon.name: Hitmonlee
pokemon.description: This amazing Pokémon has an awesome sense of balance. It can kick in succession from any position.

pokemon.name: Hitmonchan
pokemon.description: Its punches slice the air. They are launched at such high speed, even a slight graze could cause a burn.

pokemon.name: Lickitung
pokemon.description: If this Pokémon's sticky saliva gets on you and you don't clean it off, an intense itch will set in. The itch won't go away, either.

pokemon.name: Koffing
pokemon.description: Its body is full of poisonous gas. It floats into garbage dumps, seeking out the fumes of raw, rotting trash.

pokemon.name: Weezing
pokemon.description: It mixes gases between its two bodies. It’s said that these Pokémon were seen all over the Galar region back in the day.

pokemon.name: Rhyhorn
pokemon.description: Strong, but not too bright, this Pokémon can shatter even a skyscraper with its charging tackles.

pokemon.name: Rhydon
pokemon.description: It begins walking on its hind legs after evolution. It can punch holes through boulders with its horn.

pokemon.name: Chansey
pokemon.description: This kindly Pokémon lays highly nutritious eggs and shares them with injured Pokémon or people.

pokemon.name: Tangela
pokemon.description: Hidden beneath a tangle of vines that grows nonstop even if the vines are torn off, this Pokémon's true appearance remains a mystery.

pokemon.name: Kangaskhan
pokemon.description: Although it's carrying its baby in a pouch on its belly, Kangaskhan is swift on its feet. It intimidates its opponents with quick jabs.

pokemon.name: Horsea
pokemon.description: Horsea makes its home in oceans with gentle currents. If this Pokémon is under attack, it spits out pitch-black ink and escapes.

pokemon.name: Seadra
pokemon.description: It's the males that raise the offspring. While Seadra are raising young, the spines on their backs secrete thicker and stronger poison.

pokemon.name: Goldeen
pokemon.description: Its dorsal, pectoral, and tail fins wave elegantly in water. That is why it is known as the Water Dancer.

pokemon.name: Seaking
pokemon.description: In autumn, its body becomes more fatty in preparing to propose to a mate. It takes on beautiful colors.

pokemon.name: Staryu
pokemon.description: If you visit a beach at the end of summer, you’ll be able to see groups of Staryu lighting up in a steady rhythm.

pokemon.name: Starmie
pokemon.description: This Pokémon has an organ known as its core. The organ glows in seven colors when Starmie is unleashing its potent psychic powers.

pokemon.name: Mr. Mime
pokemon.description: The broadness of its hands may be no coincidence—many scientists believe its palms became enlarged specifically for pantomiming.

pokemon.name: Scyther
pokemon.description: It slashes through grass with its sharp scythes, moving too fast for the human eye to track.

pokemon.name: Jynx
pokemon.description: In certain parts of Galar, Jynx was once feared and worshiped as the Queen of Ice.

pokemon.name: Electabuzz
pokemon.description: Many power plants keep Ground-type Pokémon around as a defense against Electabuzz that come seeking electricity.

pokemon.name: Magmar
pokemon.description: Magmar dispatches its prey with fire. But it regrets this habit once it realizes that it has burned its intended prey to a charred crisp.

pokemon.name: Pinsir
pokemon.description: These Pokémon judge one another based on pincers. Thicker, more impressive pincers make for more popularity with the opposite gender.

pokemon.name: Tauros
pokemon.description: Once it takes aim at its prey, it makes a headlong charge. It is famous for its violent nature.

pokemon.name: Magikarp
pokemon.description: An underpowered, pathetic Pokémon. It may jump high on rare occasions but never more than seven feet.

pokemon.name: Gyarados
pokemon.description: Once it appears, it goes on a rampage. It remains enraged until it demolishes everything around it.

pokemon.name: Lapras
pokemon.description: A smart and kindhearted Pokémon, it glides across the surface of the sea while its beautiful song echoes around it.

pokemon.name: Ditto
pokemon.description: Its transformation ability is perfect. However, if made to laugh, it can’t maintain its disguise.

pokemon.name: Eevee
pokemon.description: Its ability to evolve into many forms allows it to adapt smoothly and perfectly to any environment.

pokemon.name: Vaporeon
pokemon.description: It lives close to water. Its long tail is ridged with a fin, which is often mistaken for a mermaid's.

pokemon.name: Jolteon
pokemon.description: It concentrates the weak electric charges emitted by its cells and launches wicked lightning bolts.

pokemon.name: Flareon
pokemon.description: Inhaled air is carried to its flame sac, heated, and exhaled as fire that reaches over 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.

pokemon.name: Porygon
pokemon.description: State-of-the-art technology was used to create Porygon. It was the first artificial Pokémon to be created via computer programming.

pokemon.name: Omanyte
pokemon.description: Because some Omanyte manage to escape after being restored or are released into the wild by people, this species is becoming a problem.

pokemon.name: Omastar
pokemon.description: Weighed down by a large and heavy shell, Omastar couldn’t move very fast. Some say it went extinct because it was unable to catch food.

pokemon.name: Kabuto
pokemon.description: This species is almost entirely extinct. Kabuto molt every three days, making their shells harder and harder.

pokemon.name: Kabutops
pokemon.description: Kabutops slices its prey apart and sucks out the fluids. The discarded body parts become food for other Pokémon.

pokemon.name: Aerodactyl
pokemon.description: This is a ferocious Pokémon from ancient times. Apparently even modern technology is incapable of producing a perfectly restored specimen.

pokemon.name: Snorlax
pokemon.description: It is not satisfied unless it eats over 880 pounds of food every day. When it is done eating, it goes promptly to sleep.

pokemon.name: Articuno
pokemon.description: It's said that this Pokémon's beautiful blue wings are made of ice. Articuno flies over snowy mountains, its long tail fluttering along behind it.

pokemon.name: Zapdos
pokemon.description: This Pokémon has complete control over electricity. There are tales of Zapdos nesting in the dark depths of pitch-black thunderclouds.

pokemon.name: Moltres
pokemon.description: It’s one of the legendary bird Pokémon. When Moltres flaps its flaming wings, they glimmer with a dazzling red glow.

pokemon.name: Dratini
pokemon.description: It sheds many layers of skin as it grows larger. During this process, it is protected by a rapid waterfall.

pokemon.name: Dragonair
pokemon.description: They say that if it emits an aura from its whole body, the weather will begin to change instantly

pokemon.name: Dragonite
pokemon.description: It is said that somewhere in the ocean lies an island where these gather. Only they live there.

pokemon.name: Mewtwo
pokemon.description: Its DNA is almost the same as Mew’s. However, its size and disposition are vastly different.

pokemon.name: Mew
pokemon.description: When viewed through a microscope, this Pokémon’s short, fine, delicate hair can be seen.
